docs.title: Welcome to WTAI Docs
docs.text: This is the documentation site for WTAI, built with MkDocs and Material.

docs.title: Mermaid diagram: Overview
docs.text:
flowchart LR
User --> Docs[WTAI Docs]
Docs --> Publish[GitHub Pages]

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text: Core components and deployment for the WTAI documentation site.

docs.title: Mermaid diagram: High-level architecture
docs.text:
flowchart TB
subgraph Local
A[Markdown Files]
B[MkDocs]
end
A --> B --> C[Static Site]
C -->|Push| D[GitHub Repo]
D --> E[GitHub Actions]
E --> F[GitHub Pages]

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and understand the WTAI documentation site.

docs.title: Mermaid diagram: Documentation workflow
docs.text:
flowchart LR
A[Write Markdown] --> B[Live Preview]
B --> C[Commit to Git]
C --> D[GitHub Actions Builds]
D --> E[GitHub Pages Deploy]

docs.title: Mermaid diagram: Contribution process
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
participant U as User
participant R as Repo
participant CI as GitHub Actions
participant P as Pages
U->>R: Open PR
R->>CI: Trigger workflow
CI->>P: Publish site
P-->>U: Live docs
